metadata.description: Tiny corpus for testing - 1 question per difficulty

questions.question: What is the rated voltage of the XYZ transformer?
questions.ground_truth_answer: The XYZ transformer has a rated voltage of 480V AC.

questions.question: What safety certifications does the ABC inverter have and what do they cover?
questions.ground_truth_answer: The ABC inverter has UL 1741 certification for grid-tied inverters and IEC 62109 for safety of power converters.

questions.question: Compare the efficiency ratings of the solar panel models SP-100 and SP-200 under standard test conditions and explain which performs better in low-light scenarios.
questions.ground_truth_answer: The SP-100 has 19.5% efficiency under STC while SP-200 achieves 21.2%. However, SP-100 performs better in low-light conditions due to its half-cut cell design which reduces resistive losses at lower irradiance levels.
